name: Debris
summary:
Elyzabeth awakens in a cell after being attacked at the entrance to her apartment. She'll spend a long time trying to find a way out and an explanation to this, but she'll soon discover that she is not alone there.

The phone will start ringing in the room and when she picks it up, Elyzabeth won't believe what she hears:

"Hi Ellie.
You may be wondering where you are.
You Ellie, you're the reason for my pain.
And the time has come for you to pay for everything you've done to me.
This will be... the last day of your life. "

Will you dare to try to reveal the motives behind Elyzabeth's kidnapping?
